NK013(pa)016:1450: bskyed rim gyi rnam dag dran pa'i skabs thun mtshams
NK013(pa)016:1451: la lob pa zhes bya ba de'i dgos pa yin
NK013(pa)016:1452: pas so // de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa mdor bsdus su bstan nas /
NK013(pa)016:1453: da ni rtsa ba'i gsum pa 'bras bu la gnyis /
NK013(pa)016:1456: dang po de ltar goms pas dbang po'i rnam shes
NK013(pa)016:1457: rnams yul la 'phro ba'i rgyun kheg pas dbang shes
NK013(pa)016:1458: kyi bzhon pa'i rlung rnams nang du ldog /
NK013(pa)016:1459: nye ba'i rtags su mig sngar khang pa du bas
NK013(pa)016:1460: khengs pa lta bu sogs sngo long long po dang
NK013(pa)016:1461: / bye thang la nyi 'od phog pa rgyang nas
NK013(pa)016:1462: bltas tshe chu rgyug pa lta bu sogs shig shig
NK013(pa)016:1463: bar snang smin rgyu lta bur mthong ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1464: srin bu me khyer lta bu'i snang ba me 'bar
NK013(pa)016:1465: ba ltar dmar tsag tsag gi 'od 'phro ba song
NK013(pa)016:1466: ba dang / mar me 'bar ba lta bu'i lhab lhab 'bar bar snang ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1467: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dwangs pa ltar gsal stong
NK013(pa)016:1468: mtha' dbus med par gnas pa'i snang ba 'char ba
NK013(pa)016:1469: ste / mtshan ltas lnga nyams kyi tshul du 'char ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1470: rmi lam gyi ltas su sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK013(pa)016:1471: sems dpa'i sku so sor bzhugs pa mthong ba dang
NK013(pa)016:1472: / sangs rgyas dang bdag mtshungs par bdag lhar gsal
NK013(pa)016:1473: ba'i sku mdun rgyab tu phyi nang med par phyogs
NK013(pa)016:1474: thams cad du zhal tha ler mthong ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1475: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK013(pa)016:1476: kyi bdag lhar gyur pa la phyag mchod mdzad par
NK013(pa)016:1477: mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos
NK013(pa)016:1478: zab mo ster ba dang bshad par rmi ba ste
NK013(pa)016:1480: gzhan yi dam sku gzugs zhal 'dzum pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1482: sku ma mthong yang gsung thos pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1483: lha mo'i glu dbyangs thos pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1484: gzhal yas khang las sgra byung ba thos pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1485: grogs po dam pa zhes byang sems rnams kyi 'bod pa dngos sam rmi lam du 'byung ngo //
NK013(pa)016:1486: de dag kyang gong du bshad pa'i rtogs pa dang
NK013(pa)016:1487: rgyud tshod de dag slebs pa rnams la byung na
NK013(pa)016:1488: yang dag pa'i ltas su go la /
NK013(pa)016:1489: deng sang rang re tha mal pa la rang gar
NK013(pa)016:1490: ltas de rigs 'ong don med par 'ong na gdon
NK013(pa)016:1491: gyi cho 'phrul lam bar chad kyi ltas sam rlung
NK013(pa)016:1492: la sogs pa nad kyis 'phrul lam bag chags kyi
NK013(pa)016:1493: sems rmis tsam du zad kyi don med par shes
NK013(pa)016:1494: par bya ste / sems rgyud la nyams dang rtogs
NK013(pa)016:1495: pa'i dri tsam mi bro bzhin du de dag yin
NK013(pa)016:1496: du re ba'i o zob byed pa'i rang gi de
NK013(pa)016:1497: nyid gsal bar byed pa kho na'o //
NK013(pa)016:1498: gzhan yang bshad dgos pa mang yang tshogs chen 'dus pa'i skabs na 'chad par spro'o //
NK013(pa)016:1503: / 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen //
NK013(pa)016:1504: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
NK013(pa)016:1505: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK013(pa)016:1506: zhes rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba rtogs shing /
NK013(pa)016:1507: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bskyed rdzogs kyi ting nge
NK013(pa)016:1508: 'dzin goms pas lta spyod zung 'brel du 'byor ba'i
NK013(pa)016:1509: sgrub byed thabs kyi nges pa mi gtong ba'i gzungs
NK013(pa)016:1510: kyang yin la / de dag sa bon dang chu
NK013(pa)016:1511: lud ltar 'bras bur smin byed kyi rgyu dang rkyen
NK013(pa)016:1512: kyang yin la / yang yin te / lta ba
NK013(pa)016:1513: rtogs nas stong chen dang kun ting la gnas pa
NK013(pa)016:1514: kyang yin la / yang yin te / bsnyen pa
NK013(pa)016:1515: dang / phyag rgya gcig spros ni nyer bsnyen dang
NK013(pa)016:1516: kyang yin la / yang yin te / bsnyen pa dang / / tshogs sgrub ni sgrub pa /
NK013(pa)016:1517: de 'bras mthong lam thob ma rag pa'am thob pa ni sgrub pa chen po ste /
NK013(pa)016:1518: de dag gang gi dus su yang rtogs goms gnyis
NK013(pa)016:1519: kyi 'bras bus 'byin nus kyi mthu can du gang
NK013(pa)016:1520: gis sku gyur pa'i tshe zag med slob pa'i lam
NK013(pa)016:1522: mi slob rgyal ba sku lnga'i go 'phang thob nas
NK013(pa)016:1523: sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu grags par 'gyur bas
NK013(pa)016:1524: / tshom bu tshogs su sgrub pa'i mtha' na srod lha dang /
NK013(pa)016:1526: tho rangs yum las dngos grub blangs pas /
NK013(pa)016:1527: thig le yas babs kyi mtha' na dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang /
NK013(pa)016:1528: mas brtan gyi mtha' na rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
NK013(pa)016:1529: pa'i ye shes mthong lam don gyi 'od gsal rgyud
NK013(pa)016:1530: la skyes nas / de'i rjes thob tu bsam yas
NK013(pa)016:1531: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor du ldang ba la
NK013(pa)016:1535: shes rab kyi stobs che ba rnams kyis zag bcas
NK013(pa)016:1536: kyi phung po dwangs ma'i lus su gyur nas 'chi
NK013(pa)016:1537: ba med pa tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob
NK013(pa)016:1538: pas rnam smin rig 'dzin las yon tan lhag par
NK013(pa)016:1539: bcas pa'i phyir lhag bcas kyi rig 'dzin nam tshe
NK013(pa)016:1540: dbang rig 'dzin / lam yongs su ma rdzogs bar du tshe la dbang ba'o //
NK013(pa)016:1541: de ltar brtson ting shes rab kyi stobs cung zad
NK013(pa)016:1542: zhen pa dag gis de ltar dwangs ma'i lus su
NK013(pa)016:1543: gyur ma nus pa rnam smin rig 'dzin nam lhag
NK013(pa)016:1544: med myang 'das zhes lam rim las gsungs so //
NK013(pa)016:1546: nus pa thob dang ma thob pas //
NK013(pa)016:1547: mthong lam gnyis su phye ba yin //
NK013(pa)016:1548: zhes rnam smin bar tshe'i bar chad pa bar dor
NK013(pa)016:1549: sa gnyis par spang rtogs na 'phar nas sa dgu
NK013(pa)016:1550: pa'i bar phyag chen rig 'dzin dang /
NK013(pa)016:1551: bcu nas rgyun mtha'i bar lhun grub rig 'dzin la
NK013(pa)016:1552: bzhed pa 'di zur gyi rig 'dzin chen po rnams
NK013(pa)016:1553: kyis bzhed pa bla na med pa yin pas gzhan
NK013(pa)016:1555: rig 'dzin bzhi po de dag gis 'phags pa slob
NK013(pa)016:1556: pa'i sa bcu chod tshul las dgongs spyod rgya mtsho
NK013(pa)016:1557: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med la goms pa ches
NK013(pa)016:1558: che bas / rnam smin dang sa brgyad pa /
NK013(pa)016:1560: phyag chen dang sa bcu pa /
NK013(pa)016:1561: lhun grub rig 'dzin dang bcu gcig kun tu 'od dang dgongs spyod mnyam pa yin la /
NK013(pa)016:1562: rjes kyi yon tan gyi thob tshul mtshan nyid theg pa dang mi 'dra ba lam rim las /
NK013(pa)016:1563: mnyam par bzhag las ma g.yos shing //
NK013(pa)016:1564: stong gi 'jig rten brgya stong phrag /
NK013(pa)016:1565: bcu yi rdul snyed 'jig rten dang /
NK013(pa)016:1566: zhing khams grangs med brgya stong phrag /
NK013(pa)016:1567: bcu yi rdul snyed zhing khams su /
NK013(pa)016:1568: rngon dang smad tshongs la sogs pa /
NK013(pa)016:1569: sprul pa'i lus kyi 'dul bar byed //
NK013(pa)016:1571: dgongs pa dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med la mnyam par bzhag bzhin pa las ma g.yos par /
NK013(pa)016:1572: dus skad cig re re la stong gsum gyi stong
NK013(pa)016:1573: chen po'i 'jig rten brgya yi zhing gi rdul snyed
NK013(pa)016:1574: kyi grangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba dang
NK013(pa)016:1575: / rang gi lus de snyed ston pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1577: sems can de snyed 'dul ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1578: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid la 'jug pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1579: chos kyi sgo de snyed ston pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1580: zhing de snyed g.yo ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1581: 'od zer de snyed 'gyed pa rnam smin rig 'dzin gyi yon tan dang /
NK013(pa)016:1582: tshe dbang rig 'dzin stong gsum 'jig rten brgya rtsi
NK013(pa)016:1583: gzhir byas pa'i stong phrag gi 'jig rten gyi rdul
NK013(pa)016:1584: snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba
NK013(pa)016:1585: sogs dang / phyag chen rig 'dzin dus skad cig
NK013(pa)016:1586: la snga ma de rtsi gzhir byas pa'i 'jig rten
NK013(pa)016:1587: gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu yi rdul snyed kyi
NK013(pa)016:1588: sogs dang / grangs dang / lhun grub rig 'dzin dus skad cig la /
NK013(pa)016:1589: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag
NK013(pa)016:1590: bcu'i rdul snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba
NK013(pa)016:1591: sogs mtshan nyid theg pa las ches khyad par yod
NK013(pa)016:1593: da ni rtsa ba'i gsum pa sgrub pa rjes kyi bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)016:1594: bar chad med pa'i lam la tshogs sgrub pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK013(pa)016:1595: sngon 'gro shom byed cing nub dang po 'go 'dzin
NK013(pa)016:1596: gyi bsnyen pa la 'jug pa dang bcas pa ni
NK013(pa)016:1597: bsnyen pa / ci tsam sgrub pa'i zhag grangs phyed tshun chad ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa ste /
NK013(pa)016:1598: de gnyis las 'od zer dkar po spros pas dngos grub kyi snod rung du byed nas /
NK013(pa)016:1599: nub tha ma ma gtogs pa'i phyed yan chad 'od
NK013(pa)016:1600: zer dmar po'i 'phro 'du bsnol mas dngos grub bskul
NK013(pa)016:1601: zhing bsdu bas bcud dag par byed pa ni sgrub
NK013(pa)016:1602: pa dang / rtags mthong nas nub tha mar 'od
NK013(pa)016:1603: zer mthing ga'i tshur bsdu bas rgyud dag par byed
NK013(pa)016:1604: pa ni sgrub pa chen po ste /
NK013(pa)016:1605: de dag ni bsnyen pa'i lugs kyi bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi zhes bya ba ste /
NK013(pa)016:1606: de yang zla ba gcig la dper mtshon na /
NK013(pa)016:1608: zla phyed phyed zhal nye bsnyen dang //
NK013(pa)016:1610: bco lnga mar phyed sgrub pa ste /
NK013(pa)016:1613: zhag grangs tshang nas rtags byung na //
NK013(pa)016:1614: dngos grub blang ba sgrub chen po //
NK013(pa)016:1616: de yang lo gcig gi dbang du byas na /
NK013(pa)016:1617: bsnyen pa'i sta gon gyi bya ba nas nub dang
NK013(pa)016:1618: po bsnyen pa'i mgo 'dzug pa yan chad bsnyen pa'i
NK013(pa)016:1619: yan lag dang / de nas zla ba drug gi
NK013(pa)016:1620: bar du ting nge 'dzin gtso bor bsgom zhing bsnyen
NK013(pa)016:1621: pa zla ba ni nye bsnyen dang /
NK013(pa)016:1622: de nas na zla ba drug gi bar du sgrub pa la gtso bor 'dzab khang dbye zhing /
NK013(pa)016:1623: dkyil chog gi rnam shes nam mkha' sogs 'dzab bskul byas te /
NK013(pa)016:1624: mdun bskyed gsal btab ste sgrub pa'o //
NK013(pa)016:1625: dang po bskyed rim la bslab pa'i dus na mdun gyi thang sku la dmigs te bsgom pa ni /
NK013(pa)016:1626: gang zag dbang po 'bring dang tha ma'i dbang gis
NK013(pa)016:1627: bskyed rim la gsal snang thon sla ba'i ched kyis
NK013(pa)016:1628: dang po de ltar goms nas /
NK013(pa)016:1630: de rang gi lus la spos te bsgom pas /
NK013(pa)016:1631: gtso bo bdag bskyed kho na yin la /
NK013(pa)016:1632: sgrub pa'i skabs 'dir ni bdag mdun gnyis ka la
NK013(pa)016:1633: gsal snang thon dgos pa'i khyad par yod pa bzhin
NK013(pa)016:1635: de nas tha ma'i zhag bdun gyi sngon rol du mchod pa gsar du bshams /
NK013(pa)016:1637: bzlas pa'i tshe dngos grub bskul ba'i sngags rtsa sngags
NK013(pa)016:1638: la k+aa ya w+aaka tsit+ta sarba sid+d+hi pha la h'u
NK013(pa)016:1640: nub tha ma'i tho rangs kyi dus su dngos grub
NK013(pa)016:1641: zhu dgos pa dus kyi gnad khyad par yin te
NK013(pa)016:1642: / de yang nam langs nyin gung bar snang ba'i dus /
NK013(pa)016:1643: nyin gung nas srod kyi bar mched pa'i dus /
NK013(pa)016:1644: srod nas mtshan gung bar thob pa'i dus /
NK013(pa)016:1645: de nas tho rangs kyi bar rnams nyer thob bam 'od gsal gyi dus yin pas /
NK013(pa)016:1646: rgyal bu don grub kyis tho rangs rgyal rnga brdung
NK013(pa)016:1647: du nye ba na zad dang mi skye shes pa'i
NK013(pa)016:1648: ye shes mngon du mdzad pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1649: rnying ma'i sngags gzhung tshad ma rnams nas /
NK013(pa)016:1650: deng sang skya reng dang po shar //
NK013(pa)016:1651: rdo rje sems dpa'i nam yang langs //
NK013(pa)016:1653: rdo rje srin po'i nam yang langs //
NK013(pa)016:1654: zhes pa rnams dus gnad khyad par can 'di la dgongs pas /
NK013(pa)016:1656: nub tha ma'i mtshan phyed tsam nas yar langs te /
NK013(pa)016:1657: las byang rgyas pa tshar gcig bsnyen pa dang bcas pa mchod bstod bcas grub par byas /
NK013(pa)016:1658: mdun bskyed mi bsdu bar bzhag nas /
NK013(pa)016:1659: tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgyas par bskor nas /
NK013(pa)016:1660: lhag ma dang brtan ma yan chad grub pa dang /
NK013(pa)016:1661: de nas dngos grub kyi gegs sdig pa dang nyams
NK013(pa)016:1662: chag bshags pa ye shes sku mchog tshar gsum dang
NK013(pa)016:1663: / dngos grub kyi bar chad bgegs bsal ba la /
NK013(pa)016:1664: h'u h'u h'u bi shwa badz+ra dang /
NK013(pa)016:1666: srung ba'i 'khor lo brtan par bsgom /
NK013(pa)016:1668: mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba sras bcas kyi byin rlabs bsdu ba /
NK013(pa)016:1669: 'phags mchog thugs rje sogs bab drug 'das bzhis byin dbab /
NK013(pa)016:1670: de nas rtsa sngags la dngos grub bskul ba'i gsham btags nas brgya rtsa bzlas /
NK013(pa)016:1671: sman thod chang gis bkang ba thogs te /
NK013(pa)016:1672: gzhung gi sman mchod h'u sangs rgyas kun dang sogs
NK013(pa)016:1673: nas bla ma brgyud pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs
NK013(pa)016:1675: bdud rtsi gu ya'i lag gi phyag rgyas gtor bas
NK013(pa)016:1676: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i zeg ma nam mkha' la
NK013(pa)016:1677: sprin bzhin chags pa las bdud rtsi'i char chen po
NK013(pa)016:1678: babs te / lha tshogs thams cad mnyes shing sku
NK013(pa)016:1679: gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thams cad thob par bsam
NK013(pa)016:1680: babs te / / de nas gtor ma dang dngos
NK013(pa)016:1681: grub kyi rdzas bza' btung ci rigs pa rnams la
NK013(pa)016:1682: babs te / / longs spyad nas / dmigs pa
NK013(pa)016:1683: rdzas de dag lha'i ngo bor shes pas gnas gsum
NK013(pa)016:1685: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dang bcas pa'i dngos grub thob par bsam la /
NK013(pa)016:1687: ye shes rgyal po sogs brjod nas /
NK013(pa)016:1688: mdun bskyed kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bdag nyid la thim
NK013(pa)016:1689: nas gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob par bsam
NK013(pa)016:1694: lus bsrung bcas rjes rgyas par byas nas /
NK013(pa)016:1695: de nyin nas zhag shas bar du gnas bzung zhing
NK013(pa)016:1696: yi dam la gtang rag gi tshogs ci 'byor par
NK013(pa)016:1697: phul / kha skong gi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ci rigs par bya /
NK013(pa)016:1698: de nas rgyal chen mchod gtor dang /
NK013(pa)016:1699: rgyal tho bkrol nas zhag kha shas su 'dug /
NK013(pa)016:1700: de nas rim gyis rdo rje mched lcam dam tshig
NK013(pa)016:1701: gtsang ba rnams dang rim gyis 'phrad par bya ba
NK013(pa)016:1703: mi mang po dang 'phrad pa sogs byas na grib
NK013(pa)016:1704: gnon lta bus har gyis 'chi ba yang thos pas
NK013(pa)016:1706: de dag gis lam nges rdzogs kyi rim pa'i dbang du byas pa yin la /
NK013(pa)016:1707: las dang po pas bsnyen 'brel tsam bya ba la /
NK013(pa)016:1708: nyin thun gnyis dang mtshan thun gnyis bcas bzhis 'jug
NK013(pa)016:1709: bde bas nyin mo'i thun snga dro la las byang
NK013(pa)016:1710: rgyas par btang / 'dzab khang dbye ba dang /
NK013(pa)016:1711: dkyil chog gi 'dzab bskul bcas bsnyen pa ci nus dang /
NK013(pa)016:1715: ye shes pa bsdu ba gsum gyi dang po bzhi bstod bya bar gsungs pa ltar na /
NK013(pa)016:1717: rnam shes rnam dag bcom ldan sogs kyis bstod /
NK013(pa)016:1719: ye nas gnyis med sogs kyis nongs pa bshags /
NK013(pa)016:1721: rang bzhin dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis /
NK013(pa)016:1722: rang bzhin dbyer med du rtogs pa'i phyir /
NK013(pa)016:1724: ye shes rgyal po sogs kyis rig pa'i me tog dor zhing /
NK013(pa)016:1728: ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig pa chu la chu bzhag pa bzhin dbyer med du thim /
NK013(pa)016:1729: badz+ra sa ma ya hoh zhes dbang du gyur nas dgyes shing chags par byas /
NK013(pa)016:1730: dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes phyag rgya bzhis brtan cing gsal bar byas nas yi ge brgya pa bazla'o //
NK013(pa)016:1731: de nas nyer bsdu go bgo lus srung bar bya'o //
NK013(pa)016:1732: de bzhin thun thams cad du nges pa'o //
NK013(pa)016:1733: de nas thun phyi ma gsum la /
NK013(pa)016:1734: las byang dang lha bskyed pa'i gzhung tshig rnams rgyas
NK013(pa)016:1735: par mi lcogs na kun mkhyen chen po'i ngal gsol
NK013(pa)016:1736: don khrid kyi dgongs pa 'di bzhin btang bas 'thus
NK013(pa)016:1737: te / bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams sogs /
NK013(pa)016:1738: e ma hohngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK013(pa)016:1739: sogs kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i sems bskyed nas /
NK013(pa)016:1741: dngos rnams nyid nas sogs tshigs bcad rnams brjod /
NK013(pa)016:1742: bar gyi tshig lhug rnams dor nas /
NK013(pa)016:1743: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
NK013(pa)016:1747: brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
NK013(pa)016:1749: de nas sems nyid a dkar po dri ma med pa nas /
NK013(pa)016:1750: nam mkha'i mtha' klas par 'bar ba'o //
NK013(pa)016:1752: ri rab kyi steng du rgyu'i a las b+h+r+aum chad /
NK013(pa)016:1753: s+pha ra na phatah sam ha ra na h'u /
NK013(pa)016:1754: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+da la b+h+r+aum /
NK013(pa)016:1756: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK013(pa)016:1760: seng+ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
NK013(pa)016:1761: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la //
NK013(pa)016:1762: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK013(pa)016:1764: a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i //
NK013(pa)016:1766: mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid nges //
NK013(pa)016:1767: a s+pha ra na phatah ces dang /
NK013(pa)016:1768: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK013(pa)016:1770: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK013(pa)016:1778: mchod pa rnams sngags kyis byas nas /
NK013(pa)016:1780: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK013(pa)016:1782: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che hoh'i bar brjod /
NK013(pa)016:1785: bde bar gshegs pa khyed ci 'dra //
NK013(pa)016:1787: bdag cag bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK013(pa)016:1789: yang dag don gyi snying po sogs nas /
NK013(pa)016:1791: de nas 'dzab kyi rjes bstod bshags /
NK013(pa)016:1792: ye shes pa bsdu ba bcas grub nas /
NK013(pa)016:1793: nyer bsdu go bgo lus srung bar byas pas 'thus pa yin no //
NK013(pa)016:1794: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' rig rnams kun gyi bdag po mchog gi lam //
NK013(pa)016:1795: sras bcas rgyal ba ma lus mi lus lus pa med kun gyis //
NK013(pa)016:1796: kun nas bsgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi mthar thug grub pa'i skye bo 'jug pa'i gnas //
NK013(pa)016:1797: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po bshad dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi gsang chen theg pa mchog gi rtse //
NK013(pa)016:1798: las dang ye shes dngos grub 'dod rgu ma lus bslu ba med par 'byung ba'i gzhir //
NK013(pa)016:1799: dang po'i las can 'jug dang bar du nyams len nges pa'i gnad //
NK013(pa)016:1800: gnas skabs rig 'dzin bzhi dang mthar thug 'bras bus mngon du byed pa'i thabs //
NK013(pa)016:1801: shes 'jug 'byor pa'i gzungs kyi chings kyis bcings pa'i bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi'i 'gros //
NK013(pa)016:1802: rnam dag gzhung la thos bsam byas dang man ngag zab mo goms pa'i mthus /
NK013(pa)016:1804: / 'di na skal bzang skye bo'i 'jug ngogs grub brnyes bye ba'i thugs kyi gsang mdzod ma lus pa //
NK013(pa)016:1805: thang mar brdal nas nyung ngu'i ngag gis gdams 'di rang dang skal mnyam rjes 'brangs rnams //
NK013(pa)016:1806: brtse ba'i shugs kyis snying por dril nas brjod pa'i gtam 'di ngo mtshar dus kyi dga' ston yin /
NK013(pa)016:1808: / 'dis thob dge bas dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dbyings phyug rdo rje btsun mor dgyes rol pa'i //
NK013(pa)016:1809: dga' chen rtag pa'i ye shes sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba
NK013(pa)016:1810: kha sbyor bdun dang ldan pa yid can 'gro bas
NK013(pa)016:1811: thob par shog / ces pa rdo rje sems dpa'
NK013(pa)016:1812: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhi ba 'bring po'i sgrub thabs
NK013(pa)016:1813: la brten nas lam nges rdzogs dang mos bsgom gyi
NK013(pa)016:1814: lam gyis 'jug pa 'di ni bka' drin mtshungs pa
NK013(pa)016:1815: med pa bstan pa'i nyi ma nyid /
NK013(pa)016:1816: yid lhung bla ma sgyu 'phrul ba'am /
NK013(pa)016:1817: dga' rab mdun nas rgyud 'di'i man ngag gnad rnams
NK013(pa)016:1818: gsan nas thugs nyams su bzhes tshul gyi gsung rgyun
NK013(pa)016:1819: dang / a bu dpal sprul rin po ches na
NK013(pa)016:1820: rag dong sprug gi bsnyen pa btang tshul zhal nas
NK013(pa)016:1821: snyan du brgyud pa bka' drin can gyi dong sprug
NK013(pa)016:1822: gi bsnyen yig gnang ba rnams rtsa bar bzung nas
NK013(pa)016:1823: dang / / go 'jo rag dgon mchog sprul bshad
NK013(pa)016:1824: sgrub rgya mtshos mdo sgyu gnyis kyi mtshams grwa gsar
NK013(pa)016:1825: 'dzug gi thugs bzhed kyis snga phyir bskul ba don
NK013(pa)016:1826: dang / / yod pa'i phyir / gsang ba sgyu
NK013(pa)016:1827: 'phrul gyi gnas la mos pa lam du byed pa
NK013(pa)016:1828: pad+ma las 'brel rtsal gyis spel ba phyogs dus kun
